alert.note: Alert for Griggs (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 12:42PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 4 or more inches are possible, along with winds gusting as high as 35 mph and dangerous wind chills. Significant blowing and drifting snow is also possible. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Mahnomen County. In North Dakota, Griggs County. * WHEN...From midnight CST tonight through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
